General.Name: Jiangyin Pivot Automotive Products Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangyin Pivot Automotive Products Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile connecting technology and pipeline systems in China. It provides water coolant system connecting pipelines, power train system connecting pipelines, vacuum system connecting pipelines, PHEV pipeline systems, and connecting and decorative parts. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Jiangyin, China.
